content: following rounds round 09 single_crochet in next 24 stitches blo 24 row 01 chain 1 single_crochet 2 turn 2 insert safety eyes between rounds 07 and 08 row 02 single_crochet 2 turn 2 approximately four or five stitches apart make row 03 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch in the first sure the fins are kept symmetrically on either stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet in the next stitch side begin stuffing enough to keep its shape but slip_stitch on the side of the tail to help the tail less enough that it still has that squishable keep a round shape fasten_off and weave in the appeal end © kuroviolet 2022 / nikkie l 2022 3 final notes… thank you for downloading my no-sew whale pattern there are plenty of other small whale patterns on the vast reaches of the internet but the ones i could find that looked the way i liked were all in videos and i ve never been a fan of crocheting from videos so i made up my own in a printable form for anyone like me who wants a no-sew option where you don t have to follow along with a 20-min video v anyway i hope you enjoyed making your own no-sew whale and i d love to see how yours turned out how creative can you get how much personality can you give your little whale feel free to share pictures on instagram with me you can tag me using the username kuroviolet_craft c ya copyright this pattern is for personal use only that means you may not sell distribute or claim this k pattern as your own downloading this pattern constitutes agreement of these terms however you may sell the finished product of this pattern though not legally required it is respectful and appreciated to credit the designer of any products you sell © kuroviolet 2022 / nikkie l 2022 4
